skills.desc: Places a [Shield] buff on all allies for 2 turns. The value of [Shield] is proportional to this Champion Level.

skills.desc: Removes all debuffs from an ally with the lowest HP, then heals this ally by 20% of this Champion MAX HP. Places a 25% [Increase DEF] buff on the target for 3 turns.
